badges.badgesDesc: Add the badges you speak and your fluency level.

languages.languagesDesc: Add the languages you speak and your fluency level.

skills.skillsDesc: Add key skills that reflect your strengths and expertise.

socials.socialsDesc: Let clients reach you through your social profiles.

education.educationDesc: Add your academic background to help clients understand your qualifications.
education.degreeHolder: Choose your highest academic degree or certification.

summary.summaryDesc: Add a short bio, showcase your work with photos, and introduce yourself in a short video.
summary.summaryHolder: Pitch your experience in a few sentences
summary.galleryPhotoHolder: Upload up to 6 images that reflect your work and activity.
summary.galleryTileHolder: e.g. My Diary, Trip Photos, Summer Memories… (optional)
summary.viedoLinkHolder: Upload a short video to introduce yourself and stand out.
summary.viedoTitleHolder: e.g. Get to Know Me, My Journey, Who I Am? (optional)

identity.identityTitle: Verify your identity to activate your profile
identity.identityDesc: Upload the necessary information to verify your profile and start applying to projects!
identity.stepStartDesc: Verifying your identity helps unlock full platform access and shows clients you're a trusted professional.
identity.stepMobileDesc: What Mobile number would you like to use for verification?
identity.stepOtpDesc: We’ve sent a 6-digit verification code to your number
identity.stepOtpLabel: Please enter it below to verify your phone number.
identity.otpLabel: Please enter it below to verify your phone number.
identity.stepPersonalDesc: Please enter your full legal name exactly as written on your official ID.
identity.stepIdDesc: Upload a clear photo of your passport or national ID.
identity.idPhotoLabel: Make sure all details are visible and sharp.
identity.stepEndDesc: Verification is under review. This may take up to 24 hours.
